Über GateRemoteSource

Founded in 2015 in Shenzhen as a PCBA workshop, later relocated to Dongguan (2021) with a 4,000 m2 facility - now a full OEM/ODM manufacturer for the global access control market.

Unsere Mission ist es, Schlüsseldienste und Installateure mit hochwertigen, hochmargigen Aftermarket-Lösungen zu ermächtigen, die einfach funktionieren.

10+ Jahre Erfahrung
500k+ Fernbedienungen / Jahr

Unsere Reise

2015

Foundation

Founded in 2015 in Shenzhen, China, starting as a PCBA assembly workshop.

2018

ISO Certification

Achieved ISO certification to strengthen our quality management system.

2020

Product Milestone

Launched our first Universal Rolling Code remote series.

2021

Expansion & Relocation

Relocated our factory from Shenzhen to Dongguan and expanded the workshop to 4,000 m2.

2021

High-Tech Recognition

Awarded the China National High-Tech Enterprise certificate.

2023

Global Reach

Exporting to 40+ countries, 100% focused on B2B aftermarket solutions.

Factory Capabilities

State-of-the-art manufacturing facility with comprehensive in-house capabilities.

4,000sqm Facility

Modern production base in Dongguan's manufacturing hub

ISO9001 Certified

Quality management systems certified since 2015

200+ Employees

Skilled technicians and engineers dedicated to quality

100% Testing

All products undergo rigorous aging and performance tests

Our Values

Principles that guide everything we do.

Partnership First

We succeed when our distributors succeed. Long-term relationships over quick sales.

Quality Guaranteed

No compromises on components or testing. Your reputation is our reputation.

Innovation Driven

Continuously improving compatibility, range, and user experience.

Global Presence

Serving professional installers worldwide.
